pages.text: Wa Ma Mana`ana 'An Nursila Bil-'Ayati 'Illa 'An Kadhaba Biha Al-'Awwaluna Wa 'Atayna Thamuda An-Naqata Mubsiratan Fazalamu Biha Wa Ma Nursilu Bil-'Ayati 'Illa Takhwifaan

Wa 'Idh Qulna Laka 'Inna Rabbaka 'Ahata Bin-Nasi Wa Ma Ja`alna Ar-Ru'uya Allati 'Araynaka 'Illa Fitnatan Lilnnasi Wa Ash-Shajarata Al-Mal`unata Fi Al-Qur'ani Wa Nukhawwifuhum Fama Yaziduhum 'Illa Tughyanaan Kabiraan
Wa 'Idh Qulna Lilmala'ikati Asjudu Li'dama Fasajadu 'Illa 'Iblisa Qala 'A'asjudu Liman Khalaqta Tinaan
Qala 'Ara'aytaka Hadha Al-Ladhi Karramta `Alayya La'in 'Akhkhartani 'Ila Yawmi Al-Qiyamati La'ahtanikanna Dhurriyatahu 'Illa Qalilaan
Qala Adh/hab Faman Tabi`aka Minhum Fa'inna Jahannama Jaza'uukum Jaza'an Mawfuraan
Wa Astafziz Mani Astata`ta Minhum Bisawtika Wa 'Ajlib `Alayhim Bikhaylika Wa Rajilika Wa Sharik/hum Fi Al-'Amwli Wa Al-'Awladi Wa `Id/hum Wa Ma Ya`iduhumu Ash-Shaytanu 'Illa Ghururaan
Inna `Ibadi Laysa Laka `Alayhim Sultanun Wa Kafa Birabbika Wa Kilaan
Rabbukumu Al-Ladhi Yuzji Lakumu Al-Fulka Fi Al-Bahri Litabtaghu Min FaÄ‘lihi 'Innahu Kana Bikum Rahimaan
